creator: M8R-3mye921@thisisnotmyrealemail.com
text:
I get a load of apache segfaults every few days and have to restart.

I have a partial backtrace if that's helpful:

Your crashes happen in PHP code. So please open a bug at bugs.php.net.
creator: rpluem@apache.org

text:
Will do.

If the kernel crashes due to weird hardware I am told this is a kernel bug.

For future: if apache crashes due to a module crashing, is this an apache bug?
creator: M8R-3mye921@thisisnotmyrealemail.com
M8R-3mye921@thisisnotmyrealemail.com
text:
Latest core file doesn't mention php at all:
